summary: A scorching indictment of the Mormon Church's historic involvement in the promotion & passage of California's Proposition 8 and the Mormon religion's secretive, decades-long campaign against LGBT human rights.
cast: Spencer Jones|Tyler Barrick|Dustin Lance Black|Linda Williams Stay|Kate Kendell|David Melson|Dennis Herrera|Fred Karger|Carol Lynn Pearson|Emily Pearson|Gavin Newsom|Mike Nelson|Chip White|George Cole|Rocky Anderson|Kathryn White|Barry Lynn|Liz Towne|Deanna Worthington|Julie Ann Stoddard|Darren Curtis|David Berrett Baker|Millie Watts|Trevor Southey|Gayle Ruzicka|Bruce Barton|Melissa Bird|Bonnie Owens|Miyo|Paul Mero|D. Chris Buttars|Scott Jenkins|Michael Waddoups|Troy Williams|M. Russell Ballard|L. Whitney Clayton|Quentin L. Cook|Kim Farah|Debi Hartmann|Gordon Hinckley|Fred Matis|Thomas S. Monson|Barack Obama|Mitt Romney|George Takei|Pali Cooper|Peter Danzig|Ryan Hollist|Ruben Israel|Derick Jones|Mark Leno|Hal Sparks
title: 8: The Mormon Proposition
